name: Temple & Cottage Industries Tour
description: On this tour we visit the complex of Majapahit-era temples at Trowulan in the province of Mojokerto in East Java.  The tour will include the main brick temples and other structures of this ancient capital of the Majapahit Empire, built between A.D.1293 and 1500. Also included in the tour will be a visit to the Trowulan Museum, the stone carving, bronze casting, traditional batik,  and glass bead cottage industries nearby, and the impressive modern day Reclining Buddha at the Buddhist Center.
